message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business.  I understand its worth to you is significant, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.  I'm offering you the product for $1,000,000.  This price reflects the value I place on the product while also leaving room for you to realize substantial gains.  Let's discuss this further and see if we can finalize a deal.
